lfsom.experiment

Class TrainSelector

  • java.lang.Object
    • lfsom.experiment.TrainSelector

  • public class TrainSelector
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is called from the client-side: The client gives the params to train the SOMs. This class combines the values of these params and organizes the trainings.
    Version:
    $Id: $
    Author:
    Vicente Buendia
